## Welcome to R

In this directory, we're going to learn the basics of R and how to use it to read in, analyze, and visualize data so you can use it in data stories.

## URPL-1620

This page was created as a guide to help students at NYU Wagner's Data Analysis, Mapping, and Storytelling course.

Here are links to the Brightspace, Slack, and Google Drive
